physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features numerous prisoners of war, together with two guards. The guard on the left hand side of the photograph has a rifle slung on his right shoulder. The prisoners of war are running on a path that is fenced with barbed wire. They are wearing their uniforms and carrying large items and bags as they are running.
title_text: Japanese prisoners of war doing physical training Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: world wars military personnel prisoners of war
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography World War, 1939 - 1945 Japan. Rikugun Prisoner of war Great Britain Army, British Indian Army
